name: Dezun Bloodrite
description: The gateway to a lost lineage of power, unlocked only with blood.

abilities.name: Blood Invocation
abilities.description: Grants an AoE bonus to all spells of the wielder, including items. However, all spells now also cost health to cast, based on their mana cost.
notes: Increases the area of effect of all abilities that support it
The health cost is applied to all abilities, even to those that do not have AoE to be increased
Does not affect active attack modifier
The health cost only applies to the initial cast costs, and not to mana cost over time
The health cost added is displayed within the ability tooltips
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the AoE bonus is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
